name: Ignited Mechanized
description:
The Dreadful Eight Studios present you an action/adventure game beyond your imagination. The Fairytail World got run over and all the Happy Endings are gone. Now you have to prove your Strength and free the World of Fairytails...

We couldnt make it in time and submitted the game unfinished. Afterall we wish you much fun at exploring the things we got in. Enjoy ;D

Infos:

  • This current  state of the game was made for an 48-hour Game Jame.
  • Unfinished
